backend/main.mo: Primary chat backend implementing rooms, message storage with TTL, reactions, media fields, and access control mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state by removing user profile data while preserving messages and room metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and recent updates for all major frontend and backend files.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/REDEPLOY_TRIGGER.txt: Trigger file used to force production redeployment without code changes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing theme, routing between welcome and chat views, and nickname/room state.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Audio recorder component handling microphone permissions, timed recording, preview playback, and sending blobs.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Full chat UI managing messages, reactions, media inputs, error handling, scrolling behavior, and message operations.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Emoji selection panel grouped by categories with click-to-insert behavior.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app title and optional leave-room button with icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/MediaPicker.tsx: Provides a UI for selecting GIFs or uploading custom stickers, including Tenor API integration and local sticker storage with TTL.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media handling, replies, and message actions.
frontend/src/components/VideoUploader.ts: Allows users to upload, preview, validate, and send video files with size checks and upload feedback.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeScreen.ts: Handles room creation and joining with nickname validation, backend calls, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for room creation, room existence checks, and sending messages with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisualViewportOffs: Tracks visual viewport changes on mobile to detect keyboard height and provide bottom offset state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, mobile viewport fixes, safe-area handling, and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/chatErrorMessages.ts: Maps backend and network errors to sanitized, user-friendly chat error messages.
frontend/src/utils/chatOperationErrors.t: Defines structured chat operation errors, transient error detection, and detailed console logging utilities.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImage.ts: Provides deprecated helpers to download images from URLs or blobs, ensuring PNG filenames and using anchor-based downloads.
frontend/src/utils/downloadMedia.ts: Offers PNG-converting image downloads and MP4 video downloads (with progress), with fallbacks for CORS issues.
frontend/src/utils/retry.ts: Implements transient-error detection and an exponential-backoff retry wrapper for async operations.
frontend/src/utils/toastOnce.ts: Provides deduplicated toast notifications by suppressing repeated messages within a short time window.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and feature requests related to guest-based room access and messaging fixes.
